file_content.text: Grants use of the "Legacy Orbital Strike" ability to all characters in your legacy. This is a powerful combat ability only usable while your Heroic Moment ability is active.
Grants use of the "Legacy Flamethrower" ability to all characters in your legacy. This is a powerful combat ability only usable while your Heroic Moment ability is active.
Grants use of the "Legacy Project" ability to all characters in your legacy. This is a powerful combat ability only usable while your Heroic Moment ability is active.
Grants use of the "Legacy Force Sweep" ability to all characters in your legacy. This is a powerful combat ability only usable while your Heroic Moment ability is active.
Grants use of the "Legacy Force Choke" ability to all characters in your legacy. This is a powerful combat ability only usable while your Heroic Moment ability is active.
Grants use of the "Legacy Dirty Kick" ability to all characters in your legacy. This is a powerful combat ability only usable while your Heroic Moment ability is active.
Grants use of the "Legacy Sticky Plasma Grenade" ability to all characters in your legacy. This is a powerful combat ability only usable while your Heroic Moment ability is active.
Grants use of the "Legacy Force Lightning" ability to all characters in your legacy. This is a powerful combat ability only usable while your Heroic Moment ability is active.
All class buffs now apply the effects of "Coordination" in addition to their own effects. Does not stack with Smuggler buff. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
All class buffs now apply the effects of "Hunter's Boon" in addition to their own effects. Does not stack with Trooper buff. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
All class buffs now apply the effects of "Force Valor" in addition to their own effects. Does not stack with Sith Inquisitor buff. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
All class buffs now apply the effects of "Force Might" in addition to their own effects. Does not stack with Sith Warrior buff. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
All class buffs now apply the effects of "Mark of Power" in addition to their own effects. Does not stack with Jedi Consular buff. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
All class buffs now apply the effects of "Unnatural Might" in addition to their own effects. Does not stack with Jedi Knight buff. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
All class buffs now apply the effects of "Lucky Shots" in addition to their own effects. Does not stack with Agent buff. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
All class buffs now apply the effects of "Fortification" in addition to their own effects. Does not stack with Bounty Hunter buff. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
Grants use of the Sacrifice ability to all characters. Sacrifice injures your companion to instantly heal yourself.
Grants use of the Unity ability to all characters. Unity reduces damage taken by you and your companion for a short duration.
Unlocks a training dummy on all characters' ships that simulates combat with an Operations toughness enemy.
Unlocks a training dummy on all characters' ships that simulates combat with another player.
Unlocks a mailbox on board all characters' ships.
Unlocks an astromech droid on all characters' ships that buys items, repairs gear, and sells unique modifications for your protocol droid.
Unlocks a Galactic Trade Network terminal on all characters' ships.
Grants use of the Equilibrium ability to all characters. Equilibrium increases damage and healing done by you and your companion for a short duration.
Unlocks use of the /agent emote. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
Unlocks use of the /bountyhunter emote. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
Unlocks use of the /inquisitor emote. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
Unlocks use of the /warrior emote. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
Unlocks use of personal rocket boosters. The rocket boost provides a brief, intense burst of speed for a short duration. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
Unlocks use of the /knight emote. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
Unlocks use of the /consular emote. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
Unlocks use of the /trooper emote. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
Unlocks use of the /smuggler emote. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
Unlocks use of the /doublelasers emote. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
Requires completion of the Agent Chapter 3 class quests.
Requires completion of the Bounty Hunter Chapter 3 class quests.
Requires completion of the Sith Inquisitor Chapter 3 class quests.
Requires completion of the Sith Warrior Chapter 3 class quests.
Requires completion of the Jedi Consular Chapter 3 class quests.
Requires completion of the Jedi Knight Chapter 3 class quests.
Requires completion of the Smuggler Chapter 3 class quests.
Requires completion of the Trooper Chapter 3 class quests.
Requires completion of the Agent Chapter 2 class quests.
Requires completion of the Bounty Hunter Chapter 2 class quests.
Requires completion of the Sith Inquisitor Chapter 2 class quests.
Requires completion of the Sith Warrior Chapter 2 class quests.
Requires completion of the Jedi Consular Chapter 2 class quests.
Requires completion of the Jedi Knight Chapter 2 class quests.
Requires completion of the Smuggler Chapter 2 class quests.
Requires completion of the Trooper Chapter 2 class quests.
Reduces the cooldown of the Emergency Fleet Pass ability by 30 minutes. Effect is cumulative with other cooldown reduction unlocks. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
Reduces the cooldown of the Emergency Fleet Pass ability by 30 minutes. Effect is cumulative with other cooldown reduction unlocks. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
Reduces the cooldown of Quick Travel by 2 minutes. Effect is cumulative with other cooldown reduction unlocks. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
Reduces the cooldown of Quick Travel by 2 minutes. Effect is cumulative with other cooldown reduction unlocks. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
Unlocks the unarmed combat move Punch, a basic brawling attack. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
Unlocks the unarmed combat move Jab, an advanced brawling attack. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
Unlocks the unarmed combat move Uppercut, an advanced brawling attack. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
Unlocks the unarmed combat move Bash, an advanced brawling attack. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
Unlocks the Companion Dance ability, which allows you and your companion to dance together. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
Reduces the cooldown of Quick Travel by 2 minutes. Effect is cumulative with other cooldown reduction unlocks.
Reduces the cooldown of the Emergency Fleet Pass ability by 30 minutes. Effect is cumulative with other cooldown reduction unlocks. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.

Grants a bonus to your total Healing Received. Increases duration of your Heroic Moment by 12 seconds and reduces the cooldown by 1 minute. You may only receive this bonus for one Healer companion. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
Grants a +10 bonus to Presence on all characters.

Grants a bonus to your Critical Damage. Increases duration of your Heroic Moment by 12 seconds and reduces the cooldown by 1 minute. You may only receive this bonus for one Melee Damage companion. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
Grants a +10 bonus to Presence on all characters.

Grants a bonus to your Accuracy. Increases duration of your Heroic Moment by 12 seconds and reduces the cooldown by 1 minute. You may only receive this bonus for one Melee Tank companion. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
Grants a +10 bonus to Presence on all characters.

Grants a bonus to your Critical Hit Chance. Increases duration of your Heroic Moment by 12 seconds and reduces the cooldown by 1 minute. You may only receive this bonus for one Ranged Damage companion. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
Grants a +10 bonus to Presence on all characters.

Grants a bonus to your Max Health. Increases duration of your Heroic Moment by 12 seconds and reduces the cooldown by 1 minute. You may only receive this bonus for one Ranged Tank companion. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
Grants a +10 bonus to Presence on all characters.
Unlocks use of the /datapad, /holocom, and /map emotes. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
Unlocks use of the /scanred, /scangreen, /binoculars, and /weld emotes. This unlock applies to all characters in your legacy.
Coming Soon: Increases influence gains from giving gifts to companions.
Coming Soon: Increases influence gain from conversation options.
Coming Soon: Increases experience gains from killing major enemies in flashpoints.
Coming Soon: Increases experience gains from completing space missions.
Coming Soon: Increases experience gains from completing warzones.
Coming Soon: Increases chance of critical success while crafting.
Coming Soon: Grants the ability to use level 25 speeders at level 10.
Coming Soon: Creates a Repair Droid that players and their allies may use to repair items in the field.
Unlocks this species as a choice for all classes at character creation.
Grants a +100 Presence bonus to all characters.
Coming Soon: Reset your skill tree in the field.

Decreases cooldown of Rocket Boost by 30 seconds.

This Legacy Unlock applies to the Rocket Boost ability, and will have no effect unless you have also unlocked Rocket Boost.

Decreases cooldown of Rocket Boost by 60 seconds.

This Legacy Unlock applies to the Rocket Boost ability, and will have no effect unless you have also unlocked Rocket Boost.
Coming Soon: Store two different skill tree layouts and switch between them.
Coming Soon: Drop a mailbox in the field for you and your allies to use.
Coming Soon: Return at increased health after dying and respawning at a medical center.
Coming Soon: Companions sell junk faster.
Requires completion of all conversations and quests for this companion.
Increases the amount of experience obtained from completing warzones by 6%.
Increases the amount of experience obtained from completing warzones by 4%. This increase is cumulative with previous increases to warzone experience.
Increases the amount of experience obtained from completing warzones by 6%. This increase is cumulative with previous increases to warzone experience.
Increases the amount of experience obtained from completing warzones by 8%. This increase is cumulative with previous increases to warzone experience.
Increases the amount of experience obtained from completing warzones by 10%. This increase is cumulative with previous increases to warzone experience.
Increases the amount of experience obtained from defeating enemies in flashpoints by 6%.
Increases the amount of experience obtained from defeating enemies in flashpoints by 4%. This increase is cumulative with previous increases to flashpoint experience.
Increases the amount of experience obtained from defeating enemies in flashpoints by 6%. This increase is cumulative with previous increases to flashpoint experience.
Increases the amount of experience obtained from defeating enemies in flashpoints by 8%. This increase is cumulative with previous increases to flashpoint experience.
Increases the amount of experience obtained from defeating enemies in flashpoints by 10%. This increase is cumulative with previous increases to flashpoint experience.
Increases the amount of experience obtained from completing space missions by 6%.
Increases the amount of experience obtained from completing space missions by 4%. This increase is cumulative with previous increases to space experience.
Increases the amount of experience obtained from completing space missions by 6%. This increase is cumulative with previous increases to space experience.
Increases the amount of experience obtained from completing space missions by 8%. This increase is cumulative with previous increases to space experience.
Increases the amount of experience obtained from completing space missions by 10%. This increase is cumulative with previous increases to space experience.
Increases the amount of experience obtained from completing class missions by 6%.
Increases the amount of experience obtained from completing class missions by 4%. This increase is cumulative with previous increases to class mission experience.
Increases the amount of experience obtained from completing class missions by 6%. This increase is cumulative with previous increases to class mission experience.
Increases the amount of experience obtained from completing class missions by 8%. This increase is cumulative with previous increases to class mission experience.
Increases the amount of experience obtained from completing class missions by 10%. This increase is cumulative with previous increases to class mission experience.
Increases the amount of experience obtained from exploration by 6%.
Increases the amount of experience obtained from exploration by 4%. This increase is cumulative with previous increases to exploration experience.
Increases the amount of experience obtained from exploration by 6%. This increase is cumulative with previous increases to exploration experience.
Increases the amount of experience obtained from exploration by 8%. This increase is cumulative with previous increases to exploration experience.
Increases the amount of experience obtained from exploration by 10%. This increase is cumulative with previous increases to exploration experience.
Increases the amount of companion influence gained from companion gifts by 10%.
Increases the amount of companion influence gained from companion gifts by 10%. This increase is cumulative with previous increases to gift influence gains.
Increases the amount of companion influence gained from companion gifts by 10%. This increase is cumulative with previous increases to gift influence gains.
Increases the amount of companion influence gained from conversations by 10%.
Increases the amount of companion influence gained from conversations by 10%. This increase is cumulative with previous increases to conversation influence gains.
Increases the amount of companion influence gained from conversations by 10%. This increase is cumulative with previous increases to conversation influence gains.
Increases the chance of an augmented result while crafting by 1%.
Increases the chance of an augmented result while crafting by 1%. This increase is cumulative with previous augment result increases.
Increases the chance of an augmented result while crafting by 1%. This increase is cumulative with previous augment result increases.
Companions return from selling junk in 30 seconds.
Companions return from selling junk in 5 seconds.
Speeder Piloting I is now available at level 1.
Speeder Piloting III is now available at level 25.
You may now quickly shuttle to your capital world.
You may now quickly shuttle to your fleet's vanguard vessel.
You may now quickly shuttle to the Black Hole.
You may now quickly shuttle to Section X.
You may deploy a basic field repair droid. This unit provides basic repair and vendor services. Redeployment time is 1 hour.

You may deploy an improved field repair droid. This unit provides basic repair services, sells some consumable items and can be deployed more often. Duration is increased by 1 minute and redeployment time is reduced by 15 minutes.

You may deploy an advanced field repair droid. This unit provides basic repair services, sells crew skill and consumable items and can be deployed more often. Duration is increased by 1 minute and redeployment time is reduced by an additional 30 minutes.
You may summon a basic field mail droid. Redeployment time is extensive.
Reduces the redeployment time for the field mail droid by 15 minutes.
Further reduce the redeployment time for the field mail droid by 30 minutes.
Field Mail Droid: Redeployment Improvement I
Field Mail Droid: Redeployment Improvement II
You may now quickly shuttle to the Outlaw's Den.
You may switch disciplines while in the field. Normal costs apply.
Speeder Piloting II is now available at level 10.
Allows you to acquire the character perk that unlocks HK-51.
Unlocks HK-51 as a companion for an Imperial character.
Unlocks HK-51 as a companion for a Republic character.
You are granted the title "The Dedicated" upon reaching Legacy Level 10.
You are granted the title "The Illustrious" upon reaching Legacy Level 20.
You are granted the title "The Renowned" upon reaching Legacy Level 30.
You are granted the title "The Historic" upon reaching Legacy Level 40.
You are granted the title "The Living Legend" upon reaching Legacy Level 50.
Improved Priority Transport: Personal Starship I
Reduces the cooldown of Priority Transport: Personal Starship by 2 minutes. Effect is cumulative with other cooldown reduction unlocks.
Improved Priority Transport: Personal Starship II
Reduces the cooldown of Priority Transport: Personal Starship by 2 minutes. Effect is cumulative with other cooldown reduction unlocks.
Improved Priority Transport: Personal Starship III
Reduces the cooldown of Priority Transport: Personal Starship by 2 minutes. Effect is cumulative with other cooldown reduction unlocks.
You may now quickly shuttle to your personal Starship. The cooldown for this ability may be reduced by Legacy Global Unlocks.
Allows you to acquire the character perk that unlocks Treek.
Complete Treek's introductory mission, obtained from the Mercenary Contract available from the Legacy Vendor or the Cartel Market.
Unlocks Treek as a companion for an Imperial character.
Unlocks Treek as a companion for a Republic character.
You may now quickly shuttle to the moon CZ-198.
You may now quickly shuttle to the moon Oricon.
Unlocks a Guild Bank on all characters' ships.
Increases the amount of experience obtained from completing Galactic Starfighter battles by 6%.
Increases the amount of experience obtained from completing Galactic Starfighter battles by 6%. This increase is cumulative with previous increases to Starfighter experience.

Grants the following abilities:
Tactical Marker: Tank Tactical Marker: Heal Tactical Marker: Damage
These abilities are only useable in Operations and Flashpoints.
You may now quickly shuttle to the moon Yavin 4. (Requires Shadow of Revan Expansion.)
You may now quickly shuttle to the planet Rishi. (Requires Shadow of Revan Expansion.)
You may now activate any vehicle or call any creature mount while moving.
Randomly activates any unlocked vehicle or calls any unlocked creature mount.
Discover the location of the datacron to unlock.
You may now quickly shuttle to the planet Odessen. (Requires Knights of the Fallen Empire Expansion.)
Unlocks a Legacy Cargo Hold on all characters' ships.
Unlocks a Item Modification Station on all characters' ships.
Reduces the time taken to give gifts to companions by 20%.
Reduces the time taken to give gifts to companions by 20%. This reduction is cumulative with previous reductions to companion gift cast time.
Reduces the time taken to give gifts to companions by 20%. This reduction is cumulative with previous reductions to companion gift cast time.
Field Personal Cargo Hold: Redeployment Improvement I
Field Personal Cargo Hold: Redeployment Improvement II
You may summon a basic personal cargo hold droid. Redeployment time is extensive.
Reduces the redeployment time for the field cargo hold droid by 15 minutes.
Further reduce the redeployment time for the field cargo hold droid by 30 minutes.
Field Legacy Cargo Hold: Redeployment Improvement I
Field Legacy Cargo Hold: Redeployment Improvement II
You may summon a basic legacy cargo hold droid. Redeployment time is extensive.
Reduces the redeployment time for the field cargo hold droid by 15 minutes.
Further reduce the redeployment time for the field cargo hold droid by 30 minutes.

Increases the amount of command experience obtained from all content by 2%.
This does not affect cxp earned through disintegration

Increases the amount of command experience obtained from all content by 2%. This increase is cumulative with previous increases to command experience.
This does not affect cxp earned through disintegration
Speeder Piloting IV is now available at level 30.
Speeder Piloting V is now available at level 35.

This Legacy-wide unlock increases Command Experience gained by 25% for characters under Command Rank 300. This effect stacks up to 4 times for a 100% bonus.
You gain one stack for each mirrored Class at Command Rank 300 (Example: A Knight and Warrior at 300 only counts once).
